description: People should not attend more than three large gatherings between 23 December and 5 January.
title: Covid: Jersey residents can meet in groups of 10 over Christmas
title_page: Covid: Jersey residents can meet in groups of 10 over Christmas - BBC News
maintext: Islanders have been advised by the government not to attend more than three gatherings of six or more people, and should not host more than one gathering per day.
